name: Elfmarked Human

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: The elfmarked has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the elfmarked to sleep.

trait.name: Magical Resonance (5/Day)
text: As a bonus action, the elfmarked gains advantage on its next weapon attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 4 (1d8) force damage.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The elfmarked human's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, mage hand

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: detect magic, mage hand, magic missile
